Title: Chapter 42
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Frank Pugliese, Laura Eason (executive story editor), Bill Kennedy (executive story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Derek Cecil
Plot: Claire joins Frank as he campaigns in South Carolina, but he doesn't trust her. A disastrous scandal blindsides Frank on primary day.
